settings.content: - Primary Button: (Ex: Add to Cart, Process to Checkout ...)

settings.label: Slider placement
settings.info: Important!!! If you choose full-width, the slider will span the entire browser winder (which could be huge!). This means your images need to be large enough to allow for this which could slow down the overall speed of the site.

settings.content: You must install [Product Reviews](https://apps.shopify.com/product-reviews) app before modifying these settings.
You may need to [create some collections](/admin/custom_collections) before modifying these settings.

settings.label: Show products from the same collection?

settings.content: If you're not showing products from the same collection, pick a collection below. The first products in that collection will be used. Pick 'None' if you don't want products shown beneath your product information.

settings.label: Collection to show beneath the product information:
Display blog tags in article page
Heading
settings.default: We'd Love to Hear From You, Lets Get In Touch!

settings.label: Allow customers to add a note to their order?

settings.content: If your customer is logged-in, the country in his default shipping address will be selected. If you are not sure about the spelling to use here, refer to the first checkout page.
Select a collection as recommend products
